songs.lyrics:
The Lord is our savior!

Faith is something that many of us talk about
But few of us have much of
Can I get a witness?

I contend that you have more faith in a pew bench than you do in the Lord

I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you...forever
(Forever)

I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you...forever
(Forever)

I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you...forever
(Forever)

I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you
I'm gonna love you...forever
(Forever)
songs.title: Forever
